properties.name: spring.http.converters.preferred-json-mapper
properties.description: Preferred JSON mapper to use for HTTP message conversion. By default, auto-detected according to the environment.

properties.name: spring.mvc.converters.preferred-json-mapper
properties.description: Preferred JSON mapper to use for HTTP message conversion. By default, auto-detected according to the environment. Supported values are 'jackson', 'gson', and 'jsonb'. When other json mapping libraries (such as kotlinx.serialization) are present, use a custom HttpMessageConverters bean to control the preferred mapper.
